title: 4 man premades have too much power :(
body: I just played a game with a 4 man premade, it was ridiculous, we weren't even losing that bad and when one of them voted to surrender the other three pressed yes as well which ended the game, I mean like WTF...

replies.body:
They do have a lot of power and it can be really frustrating to be the oddone out (either for surrender votes, banter, communication, or just  them ganging up on you).

To avoid situations like these in the future, I would suggest taking a mate into game with you. That way you can deny troll surrender votes as well as have some A+ personal communication and banter (don't forget to ping in game though). You would even have someone by your side if things get tough. 

If you haven't got any friends (or not enough so you can have someone to play at any hour of the day), you might want to [join a club](http://boards.oce.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/clubs) or take a look over on the[ team recruitment board](http://boards.oce.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/team-recruitment) :D

Good luck, have fun ♥
